data.text: I have been using fetch for over a year now. It was great for a good while, but then deals on receipts weren't being registered. I have to manually add them, except, I never receive the points for those items. Correcting the receipt doesnt actually do anything. I definitely miss the wheel. The games feature takes too long to earn points and installing apps is a hassle, for very little in return. I like being able to just snap a receipt, spon the wheel, get my points and get on with my day. Thx.
data.replyText: Hello! Thank you for the feedback! Our Team is always ready to review your missing points with you further at support@fetch.com!

data.text: It's free money if you were going to buy the items anyway. I preferred when there was a spin feature after each receipt capture. You can get more points playing the games, but I personally am not invested enough to spend more than 10 extra seconds in the app. If you are invested, the games are the way to go. I've gotten $30 in rewards so far by doing absolutely no work except snapping a photo of my receipt. It's so easy.
data.replyText: Greetings! Fetch Play is a new way to pile on points by downloading and playing games. We recognize that this may not be for everyone, and we value your feedback on the matter. If you have any other thoughts about the feature or how we can make it more beneficial for you, please let us know at support@fetch.com. Happy Fetching!

data.text: I like the idea of being able to get gift cards for scanning receipts but they keep going up on how many points it takes to actually get a gift card. That is added to the fact that fetch has a "spend" threshold in order to get the extra points that used to be available for buying one or 2 products. I rarely get more than 25 points per receipt anymore. And the games thing added? I have to change my phone settings to play that "personalizes" ads. Its a no for me
data.replyText:
App Tracking allows Fetch to track game playing activity outside the app and award points for reaching in-game milestones. Once you enable App Tracking permissions, you're can start earning points with Fetch Play.

This is strictly used to award you points for reaching in-game milestones. We do not use App Tracking for any ad retargeting purposes.

data.text: I love this app. Only thing I've noticed lately is my deal points don't auto register. I have to contact support for them to correct the receipt. Which is effect; I just don't care to always have to contact them to have it corrected. I've also noticed that it doesnt pick up on my reciepts for my Gmail. If you'd have asked me three years ago how I liked this app; I'd have given it 5 stars. But, recently its gone down hill. I hope they fix the bugs
data.replyText: Hi there! We're always here to help! Please follow the steps available in our Help Center to troubleshoot this issue: https://help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/360023014753 Let us know at support@fetch.com how they work for you. Thanks for the feedback!

data.text: Nice app. Appreciate that this was created. As a software BA, my enhancement suggestions would be: 1. Improve recognition of gas receipts. Tried more than several times to get the app to accept it, and then still had to enter the total manually. (i.e., BJs) 2. When user selects a picture to view the promo item, it is helpful that user sees a slightly zoomed-in image but allow further zoom-in to see the words on the label. There are many products we are not familiar with. (Some of us are older.)
data.replyText: Hey there! Thanks for the feedback! We have passed this along to our developers! If you have any other feedback, please let us know at support@fetch.com!

data.text: So far, it's great! However, I have not received any rewards yet, which I'm sad about. I love the animations that happen when I submit a very few receipts, currently that's my only motivation that it's given that trueley makes my brain happy! It just keeps me coming back for more, unfortunately I don't spend much in person so I don't get rewards fast, but that's just a me struggle. Overall great app!
data.replyText: Thanks for letting us know how you feel about our app. While any receipt will earn at least 25 points, you can receive hundreds and even thousands of points by redeeming the offers from your Discover page! Keep building up your points and connect with us via support@fetch.com if we can be of any assistance.

data.text: This app was great until recently. No more daily spin for bonus points, now you sign away all privacies to play games in the app for additional points. Haven't had a receipt gain more than the standard 25 points in months, so I'm accumulating at a snails pace. Previous versions, if you accumulated more than the standard 25 pts when scanning your receipt, the extra points were added. Now it's standard 25 OR the additional points, but not both. Not worth it anymore. Many issues on Reddit as well.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback! To help you rack up points faster, we bring offers to your app. Feel free to redeem some of them to earn thousands of points! Please visit the Discover page to see what‚Äôs currently available to you. Feel free to check out the new Fetch Play feature for extra points too! Happy Fetching!

data.text: This app is okay. You get free stuff for scaning a receipt where you've already spent the money so it's almost like getting cash back. The only problem is they do not like to give the big rewards you have to contact support or correct the receipt every time other than having to correct the receipts every time I complete a promotion or a reward offer a little aggravating especially whenever the receipt clearly says what the product is and what is on there absolutely no reason for it....None!
data.replyText: While we‚Äôre working to make sure that our software reads all receipts correctly, at times, it may misread an item. The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you need help with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: App is complete trash. First off you're limited to your scans per week. Second unless you're spending money buying the promos they offer you won't make any real points, and half the time, it won't recognize the offers, so you don't get your points anyway. Third and finally they have raised the prices of the gift cards so high that majority of them arent even worth saving for anymore. I've had this app for over 2 years now and can honestly say, this is the worst app ive ever used!
data.replyText: While we‚Äôre working to make sure that our software reads all receipts correctly, at times, it may misread an item. The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you need help with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: I don't care for this app. You don't get the bonuses from your receipts, I can't add my yahoo email account where most of my purchases are connected to, and the receipts that are corrected manually are often wrongly rejected. I bought 2 bottles of wine to get a specific amount of rewarded points and did not receive them because I had to manually input the total amount of the receipt. The purchases were clear as day but because it was to much to add and verify the total, I didn't get the points.
data.replyText: While we‚Äôre working to make sure that our software reads all receipts correctly, at times, it may misread an item. The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you need help with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: Some of it's good, some of it isn't. They say if you buy certain items you will get more points. 2 times I've done it and they haven't gave them to me. Pretty annoying, buying 2 loaves of $6 bread to get some points is annoying when it don't work. If it don't show up on your points you scan your purchase for proof and it still don't work. Wes need to keep working on the app. The wheel was nice too, but removed for some reason.
data.replyText: While we‚Äôre working to make sure that our software reads all receipts correctly, at times, it may misread an item. The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you need help with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. data.text: In the beginning, I absolutely loved Fetch. it was so easy to get extra points. The game was so worthwhile. Now it's becoming a waste of time. They are requiring you to play these silly candy crush type games. And are super stingy giving you your points. even when following THEIR items listed. I'm not sure how much longer I will continue following them. They truly took the fun out and the main objective.
data.replyText: Greetings! Fetch Play is a new way to pile on points by downloading and playing games. We recognize that this may not be for everyone, and we value your feedback on the matter. If you have any other thoughts about the feature or how we can make it more beneficial for you, please let us know at support@fetch.com. Happy Fetching!

data.text: I enjoy using this app and gaining points to use for purchases. Not happy about the new update where I have to download games to earn more points. I don't need anymore apps on my phone nor do I want to play games. The wheel was preferred and it should still be an option. The newest update also has me a little confused. I was going through receipts from last year and I'm having trouble finding the physical photo of my receipt. I just see a bunch of unnecessary/ different pie charts.
data.replyText: We appreciate your feedback! If you have any other suggestions, please feel free to share with us at support@fetch.com.

data.text: Not able to scan e-receipt I constantly keep reaching out to customer service, letting them know that I'm not able to link my Amazon account to retrieve my receipts from purchases. They keep sending the same reply that isn't helping. I'm still not able to scan or even link just my Gmail, but for some reason, it's saying no e-receipt available. When I have all my purchases from Amazon on there as well. At this point, I feel like it's all a lie to get your data.

UPDATE: Fetch is still cool. I love using my points to save money on other things I buy. I'd really like it to have an option for dark mode, though. PREVIOUS: I've been using Fetch for several months now. I love how easy it is to use, and there are so many opportunities to gain extra points, it's not hard to reach your goals and get rewards. Fetch is awesome!
data.replyText: Thanks for taking the time to show us your support! üòä

data.text: Annoying sound effects and animations when submitting an offer. More importantly, I am disappointed with the recent diluted value of Fetch points when redeeming for store credits. Lastly, I have found that it is rare that I find any offers recently that justify the time submitting the recent. Most often, I only receive 25 points, which due to the point dilution, is equal too less than 2.5 cents.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing this feedback! Fetch loves showering you with points! Check the Discover page of your app before your shopping trip to see what products will bring you the most points. Snap your receipt with completed offers and watch your points add up quick! If you'd like to chat with us, please send a message to support@fetch.com.

data.text: I love the app and all the different ways to get points. However, I started using the Fetch Play option the other day and it's was going well. I was getting my points. Then it stopped tracking my play time about 20 hours ago. I'm only just over the halfway point for the max amount of points you can get. I like the game I chose, but I only downloaded it because I was getting the points. I played it a bunch yesterday, and Fetch hasn't updated my points\progress for that game
data.replyText: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at support@fetch.com. Thank you.

data.text: If I'm going to be honest, this app is alright, but it's not perfect. Sometimes the receipts I scan get accepted correctly or they get mislabeled with the wrong name due to the receipt not being straight. But most of the time, it does work. I only wish I could go back and correct the error or remove the receipt and have the points deducted, but oh well. As for the Fetch Play feature, it's no Mistplay, but at least it works. Not that many games though, but it's in beta so I'll let it slide.
data.replyText: We appreciate your feedback! If you have any suggestions, please feel free to share them with us at support@fetch.com.

data.text: Points add up slowly, which I guess can be expected. But alot of times you don't get the extra points for the regular items that you're supposed to. Also, if you do manage to build up your points to where you have a sizeable amount to cash out, there's a good chance that they will lock your account and take a look at it for fraudulent activity, then block you from using it again. I personally know two people this happened to when they were going to cash out for Christmas. Both had over $150
data.replyText: Hi there, we're happy to take another look at your account! Please reach out to us at account-inquiry@fetch.com with the subject line ‚ÄúJames Whisman_App Review‚Äù. Thanks!

data.text: Used to enjoy this more, when you got to spin a wheel after submitting receipts, it helps getting points and rewards faster. Now they got rid of the wheel and you have to install and play games to earn extra points. Doing so requires me to grant access to Fetch to track my usage of other apps and more. Sorry. Sounds fishy and spammy. Not going to do that. May be time to look at other receipt award apps. :(
data.replyText: Greetings! Fetch Play is a new way to pile on points by downloading and playing games. We recognize that this may not be for everyone, and we value your feedback on the matter. If you have any other thoughts about the feature or how we can make it more beneficial for you, please let us know at support@fetch.com. Happy Fetching!

data.text: Here lately 3/2024 I have had nothing but problems with receipts. I specifically purchased several promo items without receiving any promo points. Sometimes it's because when you scan the receipt that clearly shows the item, somehow fetch interprets a random group of letters and NO POINTS FOR YOU !!! correcting the receipt seems to make no difference, ends up to be an aggravating waste of time. Very disappointed!!!
data.replyText: Wow - Thank you so much for the glowing review!

data.text: I have to say, this app is creative in its own way. While it may sound like other reward apps, it is not. This one actually rewards you Fetch gives you points for every receipt you upload on to the app to your account. The list of ways to gain even more points (sometimes 1,200 points, sometimes 300) is a fun way to earn as well. Get points, then cash in for $10/ $25/ $50 gift certificates to Amazon, Nike, the list is extensive.

Fetch was a great app until you actually start earning money and submitting receipts that you should be well rewarded for. As soon as I earned my last $50 gift card, suddenly my receipts aren't scanning correctly! Watch your receipts and make sure you get credit for everything you're buying... They will get away with it as long as you don't notice.
data.replyText: Hey there! Our Specialists can review your receipts with you and provide assistance at support@fetch.com!

data.text: Love the app so far,have only redeemed my points once so far but no problems. My only reason for the 3 star rating at this point instead of a 5 is due to not being able to use my Yahoo email on my Android phone for the e-receipts. I'm not a big online shopper but would possibly do more if I had the incentive of getting a kickback with fetch points. Update: 5 stars in 2024! I love fetch and have redeemed many times for restaurants and online shopping. Customer service has been great to me so far.
data.replyText: Support for more email addresses is on its way, so make sure that your app is always updated to the most current version. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us and wish you Happy Fetching!

data.text: Don't waste your time. I've scanned receipts with totals ranging anywhere from $10 to $300 and nine times out of ten, I only manage to score 25 points (which is the default amount you get just for scanning a receipt). This app only exists to get you to buy only brands that they specify at the amounts that they specify. You only get rewarded by buying from companies that this app has contracts with, which is made more obvious with their addition of a 'Mistplay' like feature; another type of scam!
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing this feedback! Fetch loves showering you with points! Check the Discover page of your app before your shopping trip to see what products will bring you the most points. Snap your receipt with completed offers and watch your points add up quick! If you'd like to chat with us, please send a message to support@fetch.com.

data.text: Edit 3/1/24-This app has only gotten better! I'm still using it issue-free years later! I have found that this app is easier to use for me than other apps, because I literally just take a photo of my receipt. The app detects what I have bought and matches the deals to my reciept. I don't have to go hunting for the deal myself. Also, redeeming is a breeze. You can redeem gift cards in smaller increments-like 3 dollars or 5 dollars, as opposed to some others where you need 20 bucks to cash out.

Points don't transfer from the buddies app and I wasn't able to use a single point in the buddies app because it just always gave me some sort of an error when trying to check out. Support was worthless. Don't waste your time people, this likely will get replaced with something else and you'll lose your points like I did.
data.replyText: Hi Lucas! Please contact Blue Buffalo for further assistance. You can contact them here:https://bluebuffalo.com/about/contact/.

data.text: 4 stars because there's always room to improve, but I do like this app. Better than the others I think. It's not hard to accumulate points quickly. I like the new games feature better than the old daily spin. I have been using it for a few years now and I have redeemed a few gift cards. It sucks that you have to wait 72 hrs to actually use your reward after redemption. And there needs to be a 'dark mode' option for the background. Other than that it's pretty good.
data.replyText: Hello! We appreciate this feedback and will gladly forward it to our Development team for consideration. Should you have any additional recommendations, please send them over to support@fetch.com.

data.text: Where should I start, the last 10 or 12 receipts I have submitted has been totally screwed up, I am probably missing 4000 points because when viewing receipts, 60 % of items are missing, and it seems the extra bonus items are what is missing, and some of receipts look like a foreign language or encrypted if something isn't done to correct I will be deleting my app along with my friends and family, because either you system is broke or Fetch is intentionally withholding bonus items

data.text: Started off well. Mega points most receipts. About a month ago, the points dropped to 25 points per receipt. So I figure you get massive points to get you addicted to the app, or fetch is saving money by reducing the deals, or companies are not willing to continue to give fetch the deals it was giving previously to fetch -- and points reduced. Read the other recent reviews: Now people barely get points. It simply not worth the time. Time to delete the app.

Please visit the Discover page to see what‚Äôs currently available to you. Feel free to check out the new Fetch Play feature for extra points too! Happy Fetching!

data.text: No longer give bonus points, and when asked what happened to giving bonus points on specific brands, there's always an excuse. Redeeming e-receipts NEVER catches MY brands, i.e., Knorr, Rockstar, etc., although they are listed. Furthermore, customer service is terrible, giving overt passive aggressive responses when asked nicely. The changes to this app aren't worth even trying to fix my receipts.
data.replyText: We apologize for your experience! We would love to review your recent experiences with our team. Can you please send us an email at support@fetch.com with the subject line ‚ÄúAnn's Daily Living_review‚Äù. and one of our Senior Specialists will review your account.

data.text: I have setup my online accounts in Gmail Amazon and Walmart to give me points for ereceipts but they aren't registering. I tried to update as I sW suggested on Google but to no avail. I have been doing a couple of corrected receipt options for most recently the spend $20 on lays deal but they aren't being corrected. I would say I'm missing quite a few points because of these type issues. I'm not sure how to.remedy the issue either.
data.replyText: While we‚Äôre working to make sure that our software reads all receipts correctly, at times, it may misread an item. The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you need help with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. data.text: Just okay... it takes a long time to earn rewards if you don't buy any promotional items. Also, the ereceipts needs way more improvement. Most of my shopping is online and none of it gets counted because the stores aren't part of the digital receipts program and/or because I don't have a Gmail email address. I feel we should be able to submit screenshot pictures of our digital receipts instead of having to connect to our accounts. Just another way for hackers to steal more info.
data.replyText: Support for more email addresses is on its way, so make sure that your app is always updated to the most current version. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us and wish you Happy Fetching!

data.text: Love this app! LOVE IT!!! Earn gift cards to all my favorite places just for shopping for a lot of my favorite brands! Please don't change. The only issue I have is that the amount of points needed for a certain amount have been raised. For example, a $10 Amazon card is now 12,500 points. It used to be 10,500, if I remember correctly. Inflation I suppose...

I love the app, but it's been hit or miss lately, and im losing so many points. Go to the grocery store and spend over $300 and use the app to buy certain brands just so I can get extra points, and then when I scan the receipt, it only gives me 25 points. I correct the receipt and it tells me it will take a day or so and after 2 days I check on it and it still doesn't give me the bonus points for anything. Don't receive points for playing the games they want you to download either.
data.replyText: Hello, our Support Specialists are always happy to assist you at support@fetch.com. We hope to speak with you soon!

data.text: I quite liked the app until suddenly there were limits on the receipts that they keep changing the times of. I was told I could scan more on the 27th, then it changed to the 28th, now it's changed to the 29th. I haven't been able to scan anything so it isn't like I added any to keep hitting this arbitrary limit. Meanwhile, high point offers expired while they weren't allowing me to scan, ones I HAVE receipts for. What a scam.
data.replyText: Hi there! The system currently allows you to snap up a limited number of receipts within a 7-day period. This receipt limit is based on the date you snap a picture of the receipt, not the checkout date. If you have any questions please feel free to reach out to us at support@fetch.com.

data.text: Terrible waste of time. You get a whole bunch of points when you upload your first few receipts and then after that it's 25 points per receipt and you get a $3 gift certificate if you upload 5000 points worth of receipts. If you buy the items that they value and advertise on the app they give more points and you accumulate points faster that easy but in general this app was absolutely not worth my time.
data.replyText: It makes us happy when we get to bring points to you! We award at least 25 points for any receipt you snap, but you can always earn more by purchasing our participating brands, completing offers, and referring your friends to the app. Please get in touch with us at support@fetch.com if you'd like to chat with us!

data.text: I love this app. They are true to their description-points for receipts. And now- points to play games. Every 1000 pts = $1 towards ur choice of MANY gift cards, charity, even a paid visa to use where u want. There's more to choose from than I cared to count. And there's MANY brands and items most people use every day to get the points from. They add up quickly, especially if u redeem from the offers and/or play games. And the gift cards DO WORK! Just try it. It's $ for what u already buy!

Pros: not buggy; really good at recognizing information on receipts. Cons: expensive rewards; low scanning limit; advertising ID required just to play games, which would be fine except the games replaced the old spin to win, so I can't play for extra points now because I'm not about to activate my advertising ID again just for that. Overall not terrible as an additional receipt scanner, but if I had to use only one, it wouldn't be this one, it would be CoinOut.
data.replyText: We truly appreciate you taking the time to review our app! If you have any suggestions, please don't hesitate to share with us at support@fetch.com.

data.text: Every time you get a halfway decent recipe for a halfway decent app, you change things. We used to be able to get a daily reward bonus with an annoying slot machine interface, but that seems to have gone away and now you are forced to play a game to get the same points we used to. Stop making us jump through hoops. Uninstalling this app. I've given it too many chances and they keep changing things and lowering the bonuses. Amazon is far superior with 10 times the payout and no annoying games.
data.replyText: Hey there! Fetch Play was added as an additional way to rack up points on top of snapping your receipts! If you have any questions for us, we are available at support@fetch.com!

data.text: I used to enjoy this app back with the spin to win. Now to get extra points you have to install games. I get that it's free gift cards, but they raised the amount of points needed for some and without the wheel it takes SO long to get the needed points. So now I will be looking into other options. This app just takes too long now to get anything. It does read receipts really well and the points are easy to exchange.
data.replyText: It makes us happy when we get to bring points to you! We award at least 25 points for any receipt you snap, but you can always earn more by purchasing our participating brands, completing offers, and referring your friends to the app. Please get in touch with us at support@fetch.com if you'd like to chat with us!

data.text: The app won't read receipts accurately (whether digital or physical), so you miss out on tons of promos because even when you try to correct, it goes through manual review and the corrections are often rejected, so definitely don't buy anything special for the promos. You can scan all year and maybe see $10 on a gift card. You're giving a lot of personal info and data for that kind of payback.
data.replyText: Hey there! Our Specialists can review any receipt issues with you further at support@fetch.com!

data.text: I gave a four because there is always room for improvement. For instance, being able to recognize bought deals. I hate having to manually fix my reciepts (can be done without assistance) However, that is not enough of a con to look a gift horse in the mouth. Might I add though, if this app did bring "The Wheel" back I sure hope they keep the so called "stupid games" which are normal mobile app games. *Tip* only install a few at a time and complete them. You can't reinstall for continued points.
data.replyText: Hey there! Fetch Play was added as an additional way to rack up points on top of snapping your receipts! If you have any questions for us, we are available at support@fetch.com!

data.text: it takes at least two years to hit $20 if all you're doing is just scanning all receipts. each receipt is worth 2.5cents or so. Be aware, your points can expire, and the scanner isn't as accurate as you would think. Otherwise, it's pretty decent for being free, I just wish they paid us more for our very valuable data we just hand over for pennies.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback! To help you rack up points faster, we bring offers to your app. Feel free to redeem some of them to earn thousands of points! Please visit the Discover page to see what‚Äôs currently available to you. Feel free to check out the new Fetch Play feature for extra points too! Happy Fetching!

data.text: High price for low rewards. The app itself is easy to navigate & use. The receipt scan function has always picked up deals. However, after the 1st of the year, my receipts have only received the 25 point scan bonus. Before that I was averaging 400-600 points per receipt. Considering that 1000 points equals $1 in rewards, Not sure this is worth my time any more.
data.replyText: Hi there, if you're missing points for an offer, please try using the Correct my Receipt feature. It's the easiest way to get the points you deserve! If you need our help with fixing your recent submissions, please let us know at support@fetch.com. We're always here to help!

data.text: I have used other receipts apps in the past like Ibotta , etc. None can compare to this one. Fetch is way more user friendly just scan and go. I set up my email, and for the most part, it's pretty accurate with the scan. It misses some things like UberEats, etc. Customer service is great in responding back and resolving issues. I cashed out 2x so far, and my gift card was available and ready to use very fast. I enjoy the bonus deals on certain brands, and the Huggies club is beneficial for me.

Used to be good but lately it won't scan anything correctly. Says it can't find the date or doesn't pick up any of the products. I have to manually enter everything. So after doing everything support said to do I am lowering my rating. If I could go lower than 1 star I would. Nothing works and support has given up. Basically told me I have to manually enter everything. What's the point. Time to find a better app. Do yourself a favor, STAY AWAY FROM THIS ONE! Every time they upgraded it screws up
data.replyText: Hi there, if you're missing points for an offer, please try using the Correct my Receipt feature. It's the easiest way to get the points you deserve! If you need our help with fixing your recent submissions, please let us know at support@fetch.com. We're always here to help!

data.text: UPDATE: I did send requests for review with screenshots. No replies. 1 star remains, be wary of a company that wants to track your purchases & location history. I have to say, almost each time I attempted to use my points for a reward, there was a "mysterious" review, then a point deduction. I scanned so many receipts in the past year+ but really didn't benefit. Time wasted overall. I also played 2 games after the new update following all rules, and neither were credited. I am uninstalling.
data.replyText: We are not happy when we have to deduct points from an account, however, we must do so if those points are earned by violating our Terms of Service. Please read our Terms of Service if you have any other questions!

data.text: I am not impressed. I have had to contact customer service for way too many transactions. There is clearly a defect with processing points. It is not worth the time investment to continually check the process, find the issue, contact Customer Service, wait for the wrong reply, do it again. Etc etc. Update, after 6 customer service reps. The issue was resolved. Okay folks, here we go again! Another item that is not recognized and another Service Rep that blows you off.

The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you have any other questions with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: I've been using this app for a good amount of time to tell anyone who's trying to decide on downloading to go ahead but pay close attention to your receipts. There have been MANY times that I've purchased an item that was supposed to award points, but the system gives me nothing. It takes an extra step to contact customer service, but they usually fix it in a timely manner. I dont play the games since they got rid of the daily spin, so the amount of accumulation is slower.
data.replyText: Greetings! Fetch Play is a new way to pile on points by downloading and playing games. We recognize that this may not be for everyone, and we value your feedback on the matter. If you have any other thoughts about the feature or how we can make it more beneficial for you, please let us know at support@fetch.com. Happy Fetching!

data.text: Great program but I had one complaint you lose points by not scanning receipts or electronic receipts within allotted time frame . I had 10,000 points removed and due to sickness I was unable to keep up so I don't agree with the penalty of losing the points you earn. You already lose If you don't scan receipts bc you don't earn rewards period!! If you scan your receipts you earn gift cards to use. You also earn extra points for specific items in a program. It's a win win just be sure to SCAN!!!
data.replyText: Hey there! Points expire after 90 days of inactivity, so make sure to reach out to us at support@fetch.com because there may be something we can do!

data.text: Cannot add AOL email account to fetch, so no e-receipts will be recognized. Looks like only email & outlook are recognized, so Fetch app has limitations. Perhaps I can print the email receipt & take a picture. Also any receipt older than 14 days will not be accepted. Life can be busy, and sometimes I can't capture all receipts within this limited time frame. Disappointed with this app.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! Although right now, only Gmail addresses are compatible with the eReceipt feature, you‚Äôll be able to connect your other domains such as Outlook, Yahoo, and AOL in the future. Keep an eye out for future updates to the app!

data.text: I think it's an ok app not sure if I'll continue to use when it takes oh so many coins to get to any decent reward when making corrections is not as easy as it should be. spending 30 min to correct ,figure out why it won't accept some . my tim is more valuable than the lack off reward. I do forget to upload things and with long receipts it doesn't take the photo very well. making changes to them is tedious and not that easy. It also will not accept every scan if you have multiple on the same day
data.replyText: This guide shows you how to take snaps of long receipts: https://help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015779467 If you need additional help, email us at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: I enjoy the app, but I have to dock a couple of stars because the app will not recognize my Target e-receipts in my Gmail account. I shop at Target often, so that is a lot of points I am missing out on. Edit: Yes, I reached out to support and did all the troubleshooting steps, and the system is still not recognizing my Target e-receipts.
data.replyText: Hi there! Have you tried following the troubleshooting instructions available in our Help Center? If not, please give them a go: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/360023014753 We‚Äôd be happy to hear your feedback on them at support@fetch.com. Thank you!

data.text: An update from my original rating. I love the games. This makes time go by for this old lady and gives me points, which i am so happy about. I still haven't cashed in for rewards yet but, i am looking forward to it. I am saving for something i would like. Fetch is still very easy to navigate, as always. They are truly one of kind. Keep up the great job. From one old lady that's hard to please.üë©‚Äçü¶≥üëç
data.replyText: Thanks

data.text: Let me start by saying that when I first started using this app in late 2021, it was great - then they added the daily reward, and it was even better. Now, the daily reward is gone and replaced with the crummy games, gift cards cost way too many points, you only get a lot of points for very specific products purchased at very specific retailers (many of which I don't have access to), and god help you if you want to scan e-receipts and don't have a Gmail address! Uninstalling fetch now...!
data.replyText: Hello! While the Daily Reward is no longer available, we have launched Fetch Play! With Fetch Play you can earn more points, and it‚Äôs always available. The Daily Reward was only available once every 24 hours. Head to the Social tab, tap Play, and check it out! Fetch Play is still in beta testing so it‚Äôs only available to some users.

data.text: At first I gave this app 4 stars because I didn't have many stores near me. But now I'm in a big city w/ lots of choices for receipt points. I absolutely love the games we can play 4 extra coins it's awesome. I haven't gotten to redeem points for a gift card. I hope when I do it comes in a reasonable amount of time and that it really works. I don't know how having the friends thing works &would like to know.
data.replyText: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback! Please reach out to us at support@fetch.com, if you have other suggestions.

data.text: Very disappointed with this app. After collecting points for months, I chose a $25 Visa Gift Card. I chose a virtual card in order to have access to the full $25, as u forfeit $3 (shipping fee for a card that weighs next to nothing), if u choose a physical card. When I tried to use the card info that was provided I received an error message that the card details couldn't be verified. I contacted C. S. and received a generic response that had nothing to do with my issue. Problem still not fixed!
data.replyText: Hi Chrissie! We are happy to take another look at this issue. Please shoot us another message at support@fetch.com. We're always happy to help!

data.text: This app needs a lot of improvements and needs to be remodeled. The overall look of this app is bland. It is easy to use but annoying. The processing of receipts takes days, thus leading to messages limiting your use of the app (7 days, really?üòí). You have to download games and play them just to receive 25 points. At this rate, one might as well just throw away this app and the receipts.
data.replyText: So sorry for the inconvenience! Please note, over a rolling 7-day period, you will be able to snap more receipts once the oldest of the receipts falls outside of the 7-day window. There's also no limit on eReceipts either! Thanks for understanding!

data.text: Best app I have ever found .Its fun ,Its real. It doesn't take up a lot of your time. Its well worth it in the long run. If you have any problems they will help you. When takeing pics of reciepts . Do it in a well lighted place with a black background. And if its long you can take several pictures. I have had problems seeing the date and they looked into it. and found that date. They have been very helpful. Thank you. FETCH. This is number 1. The best app of its kind. Just try it.

I've changed this app to a 1 star because every few days it wants me to verify my Amazon account again and it has become extremely tedious to deal with. I've continued to use this app and for the most part it worked some of the time. Recently it stopped working completely and it's no longer tracking my purchases. I have two packages due to be delivered tomorrow and it is still showing them as nothing. I received packages on Thursday and Friday, but the app doesn't show it. Waste of time now.
data.replyText: We're sorry to hear that you're having difficulties with the eReceipt feature and appreciate your feedback while we're working on improving it. Please know that we take the issue you're facing very seriously and will continue looking for a resolution. Stay tuned for updates and reach out to us at support@fetch.com if you have any questions.

data.text: Fetch is a great app for earning rewards from shopping at any store. You just need to scan your receipts and you will get points that you can redeem for gift cards from hundreds of brands. The app is easy to use, fast, and reliable. It also has special offers and referrals that can boost your points. I like that fetch works with any store and any receipt. I don‚Äôt have to worry about activating offers or choosing specific products. I can shop wherever I want and still get rewarded.

There are sporadic issues with the e-receipt scan feature not working properly. Sometimes it doesn't scan new receipts, other times it does. I'm missing out on points because I shop online 90% of the time. Update: After a year of using Fetch, the receipt issue has improved. Rarely do I experience any major issues with the app, and if I do, the Fetch Team responds quickly with problem resolution. I love the app and would definitely recommend it to friends.
data.replyText: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this review! If you have any other feedback, please feel free to share with us at support@fetch.com.

data.text: it seems harder to get points. The daily spin didn't give you much but better than downloading a game that takes up space and time. It takes more points to get anything decent. So I have just stuck with $10 cards because I will never get enough saved for the $25. Somebody the other day was so disappointed to see when they finally got enough points, it had went up and they needed 2000 more. A year of diligence for disappointment. I understand increase but it's twice as hard to get points.
data.replyText: Thank you for sharing this feedback! Fetch loves showering you with points! Check the Discover page of your app before your shopping trip to see what products will bring you the most points. Snap your receipt with completed offers and watch your points add up quick! If you'd like to chat with us, please send a message to support@fetch.com.

data.text: Updated: There used to be a game that you'd get to spin the wheel every 24hrs after scanning a receipt. That was fun even though I NEVER won big. I hate the new game thing. It takes way to much time and I don't want to download anything else. So frustrated and a bit disappointed now. I hope nothing else changes. It takes just a few minutes to upload receipts. so worth it. Been struggling with connecting to my Amazon account. But overall worth the time.
data.replyText: Hello! While the Daily Reward is no longer available, we have launched Fetch Play! With Fetch Play you can earn more points, and it‚Äôs always available. The Daily Reward was only available once every 24 hours. Head to the Social tab, tap Play, and check it out! Fetch Play is still in beta testing so it‚Äôs only available to some users.

data.text: Looks like I'm not the only one having issues with the e-receipts. It sure seems strange that it can pick up everything BUT the items that give higher points or your deals. Amazon constantly says it's disconnected, but it's not. Even the app says it's connected, but still, every time type the letters you see and still get nothing. Edit: Months later and it still picks and chooses when it acknowledges that you bought something that gives high points.
data.replyText: While we‚Äôre working to make sure that our software reads all receipts correctly, at times, it may misread an item. The Correct my Receipt feature is the most straightforward way to fix this: help.fetch.com/hc/en-us/articles/115015889488 Should you need help with this, please email us at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: This app is a good way to get rewarded for your purchases. However. You used to get a bonus wheel to get extra points and they took that away. Now you have to download something else to play games for points. No thank you! Lately when I go in to take pictures of my receipts it takes 4 or 5 tries to process, which is highly annoying. Sometimes it shows it takes the picture but there is a green screen at the top or it makes everything as there and check marks it all and just sits there ans spins.
data.replyText: Hello, we're sorry you've run into an issue when snapping receipts! Let's see if clearing cache resolves it: open the settings of your device > tap Apps > select Fetch > tap Storage > tap Clear Cache/Clear Storage. After that, uninstall/reinstall the app. Please email support@fetch.com if the problem persists. Thanks!

data.text: When I started Fetch it was great BUT now that they have changed to playing games for extra points and also limiting the amount of reciepts you can use it has become much harder and no good. Not everyone likes to get hooked on playing games online, I for one stay away from that. I am close to getting a certain reward and once I get the points I will be looking at alternative sites.
data.replyText: Greetings! Fetch Play is a new way to pile on points by downloading and playing games. We recognize that this may not be for everyone, and we value your feedback on the matter. If you have any other thoughts about the feature or how we can make it more beneficial for you, please let us know at support@fetch.com. Happy Fetching!

data.text: Why only 25 points for EVERYTHING now? Before when I scanned receipts, it seemed very fair and appropriate to provide different points for different products purchased. Now, I can spend over $300 for various groceries and only get 25 points. Also, I'm not a fan of the "download and play games for points" stuff. I miss the wheel. I used to love this app but now I use it less and less.
data.replyText: It makes us happy when we get to bring points to you! We award at least 25 points for any receipt you snap, but you can always earn more by purchasing our participating brands, completing offers, and referring your friends to the app. Please get in touch with us at support@fetch.com if you'd like to chat with us!

data.text: I have been using fetch regularly without any issues. However, since Christmas, I have been encountering a problem where it says I cannot scan until a specific date. On that date, I am only able to scan 1 or 2 receipts before receiving the same message with a later date. This is frustrating and a waste of time, especially since there is a 14-day limit on receipt expiration. This issue needs immediate attention as it is affecting my overall experience with fetch.

Ah, yet more examples of enshittification at its finest. First, they upped the amount of points you need in order to get anything worthwhile. Now they've introduced the same worthless spam other apps have, trying to entice you to download terrible games in order to get more points. "but u can earn even more points!!!" Yeah no. No thanks, hard pass.
data.replyText: Greetings! Fetch Play is a new way to pile on points by downloading and playing games. We recognize that this may not be for everyone, and we value your feedback on the matter. If you have any other thoughts about the feature or how we can make it more beneficial for you, please let us know at support@fetch.com. Happy Fetching!

data.text: By far, the best app I've ever downloaded. As for me, I do alot of grocery shopping at least twice a week and some stores that I shop at don't exactly list the item by brand on their receipts, it will just say grocery or frozen food, so I don't really rack up them points. The new, play games for points section was a brilliant addition to this already wonderful app. I've earned a 25$ Walmart card in less than a week. Thank you so much for giving people a fun and rewarding way to save/ make money.

Love this app!! It's one of the Best receipt apps out there, it gives you points for every receipt scanned!! Had to edit my 5 stars to 2 stars because for some reason the app isn't recognizing the brands that will give you extra points for purchasing. This has been happening ever since the last update which is extremely frustrating and very annoying. I cant correct my receipts so that fetch can fix my points, because the app won't add the items I chose for some reason. So I've lost many points.
data.replyText: If the Correct my Receipt feature isn't working out for you, we will always be available for a second set of eyes. Connect with us at support@fetch.com. Thanks for letting us know!

data.text: WAS amazing. I loved this app so much and I do use it but it's a lot less enjoyable. I use the points to help get some extra cash when we get in a rough spot. Fetch USED to have a wheel that gave out points every 24 hours with a recipt scan. Loved that!!!! A lot of us did! Now they changed it and you have to play these stupid games for points and these are very cheap and tacky games with tons of ads and it's AWFUL. Please go back to the wheel!!!

data.text: Not bad for an app where you can get gift cards for something you need anyway. However when I downloaded the App and set it all up, it automatically chose the email my phone is linked to, well that email doesn't get any of my online receipts. So I'm actually missing out on a lot of points. This App needs to be able to add different emails or more than just one email !!!! The App does not upload automatically one of my linked business accounts a lot of times either.
data.replyText: Hi there! While multiple emails can't be linked to the eReceipt feature at the same time, you can disconnect your current email address and connect another one at any moment. Feel free to switch back once you've scanned your other inbox!

data.text: I've had this app for months and recently they upgraded. This so-called upgrade forces you to install games on your device so you can earn extra points. In the past, there was a roulette wheel thing that would get you extra points once every 24 hours. That's gone now. This is a terrible upgrade. If it keeps up I will uninstall the app. Only earning 25 points per receipt was something I could live with since there was a way to get extra points randomly but this is bologna.

data.text: I miss the wheel, but I *do* like the new play feature! I've been able to get points a lot more quickly than with just receipts. I like that it is based on time played, not skill. But I don't like that I can't really choose what games to play. The faq says it's based on recommendations, but I think the algorithm's got me all wrong. If we aren't going to get access to the whole catalog upfront then I think it would be helpful if we could at least say what kind of games we do or don't like!

data.text: It used to be a great app but these new changes are becoming annoying. They removed the daily wheel and replaced it with having to play games which some of us either dont have space or time and to top it off the points required for getting gift cards has gone up. I'm just waiting to see if I'll be able to get a gift card if the points required keep going up I just won't bother anymore and delete the app.

data.text: Again, it stopped capturing any and all ereciepts. I've Amazon and CVS ereciepts that won't pick up. Why can't you get your act together. It does not work.
data.replyText: Sorry to hear that the troubleshooting steps didn't work. We want to give credit where credit is due! Please send screenshots of your orders to our support team at support@fetch.com. Screenshots should include: store name, date, email address, and the items purchased. Thank you!

data.text: Love the ease of scanning receipts & building points. But i, like SO many others I've talked to, miss the daily wheel spin which was quick & fun when little laughing creatures came out and made you smile. I've never played games on my phone, but decided to try one of them. Stupid game. Never got any points & once you get up to higher levels you get an ad that's like 30 to 60 seconds long literally every 5 seconds. Very annoying, time wasting. Will not play those games again. BAD move Fetch!

data.text: Since the new update that you have to play games to earn extra rewards, I'm not liking it very much. data.replyText:
App Tracking allows Fetch to track game playing activity outside the app and award points for reaching in-game milestones. Once you enable App Tracking permissions, you're can start earning points with Fetch Play.
This is strictly used to award you points for reaching in-game milestones. We do not use App Tracking for any ad retargeting purposes.

data.text: I have been using this app for just about a year now and over the year. I have accumulated just above a hundred thousand points. It can be challenging at times but I figured it's an extra bonus and I utilize it pretty regularly. I liked when you could still receive 5 points for expired receipts. And I liked when you had a daily spinbonus versus playing the game.
data.replyText: We appreciate your feedback! If you have any other suggestions, please feel free to share with us at support@fetch.com.

data.text: Hate the change. I've used fetch for years and always enjoyed spinning for extra points and seeing the little characters. Bring back the bonus spins and keep your app a simple receipt scaning thing. God knows that enough of my info is available already without this!

data.text: I like this app but I do think racking up points gets hard sometimes. I'm almost to a $25 amount in points but ive been snapping receipts for a while now. Receipts get you 25 points each unless there is a qualifying item on it.

data.text: This app is absolutely worth all of your time! Ive been using it for about 2 years now and it has paid off! data.text: I like the idea but it takes FOREVER to earn enough points to cash in. I spend hundreds of dollars a month at grocery stores but only ever get 25 points. It's not as fantastic as it seems. And the "discovery page" where they list items you can get extra points for either doesn't have anything I normally buy or the item is only for a certain store I don't shop at.
data.replyText: Thank you for taking the time to leave this feedback! To help you rack up points faster, we bring offers to your app. Feel free to redeem some of them to earn thousands of points! Please visit the Discover page to see what‚Äôs currently available to you. Feel free to check out the new Fetch Play feature for extra points too! Happy Fetching!

data.text: Almost every receipt I scan, I have to go back and correct it. Won't give you full credit, I've been trying to correct a receipt and it still won't give me full credit. Also been trying to contact fetch, and I keep getting told 'message failed try again' Nothing is working right on the app, if I go to frequently asked questions, it says oops something went wrong.
data.replyText: Hey there! Our Specialists can review your receipt with you further via email at support@fetch.com!

data.text: I liked Fetch much better when you were able to spin for daily rewards. Now, to earn extra points, you need to go play games. I'm not into playing games on my phone, but I'm sure a lot of people are. Before, I just got to spin right after snapping the pic of my receipt. I use Kroger delivery and purchase almost all of my groceries this way. There is not a way to connect my receipts with my email the way I can with Walmart and Amazon purchases.
data.replyText: Daily Reward has since retired! While we understand games aren't for everyone, Fetch Play was only added to be an additional, totally optional way to get points on top of already snapping your receipts, which has not changed. If you have any other questions or feedback, let us know at support@fetch.com. Thanks!

data.text: I don't understand how to play the new game to get points. It just sits there. UPDATE: My Fetch App needed an update to access game play. Still a few bugs to work out, like watching an ad for bonus items, I'm not returned to the game. If you contact Fetch, they do answer and try to help. I like this option over the daily spin where I rarely won anything beyond 25 points. Also, I do not have receipts to add every day, but I still can collect points. With a few tweeks, this could easily be 5 üåü.
data.replyText: Hey there! Fetch Play was added as an additional way to rack up points on top of snapping your receipts! If you have any questions for us, we are available at support@fetch.com!

data.text: No way to add more e receipt retailers. I've tried emailing but it's all automated & doesn't tell me how to add more retailers & emails, and what information is there leads to dead ends, it says to simply add them, but there's no link to click to add any more, and yes my app is up to date I need a real person to look and see what I'm talking about. I like the app in general but it's still lacking.
data.replyText: We appreciate the feedback! We hope to expand our list of accepted retailers in the future. If you have any questions, please feel free to share with us at support@fetch.com.
